function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Threat to sustainable development goals","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Globalization and sustained economic growth, as foundational assumptions of the sdgs, are hampered by covid-19, leading to slow progress.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reductions in air pollution due to covid-19-induced lockdowns and decreased industrial activities.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"The high level of air pollution is linked to the spread and impact of respiratory diseases, coronary heart diseases, lung cancer, and asthma, making people more susceptible to the damaging effects of contagious diseases such as coronavirus.","category":"","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Between 28,000 to 36,000 deaths per year in the uk are linked to long-term exposure to air pollutants, further increasing the impact of air pollution on public health and wellbeing.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reduction in environmental noise over the lockdown period has been reported to have saved more lives than those already caused by covid-19 in china, indicating the significant impact of environmental factors on public health.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Environmental noise pollution impacting health and well-being","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Impact of noise on exercise rates","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Impact of covid-19 on coal and oil demand","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Decline in global electricity demand during lockdown","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unprecedented reduction in global co2 emissions","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased use of online platforms and digital transformation may lead to excessive screen time and digital exhaustion.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reduced fossil fuel consumption due to remote working may lead to a decrease in transportation-related pollution levels.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased online orders for food may lead to over-reliance on delivery services and potential food safety risks.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Economic activity effect on emissions","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Industrial economy structure effect on emissions","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Emissions intensity effect on emissions","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Global economic activities driving up co2 emissions","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Effects of economic recessions on emissions","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unpredictable changes in trajectory due to social trauma of lockdown and behavioral changes","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased car ownership at the expense of mass transit, leading to higher emissions","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unsustainable use of natural resources and generation of significant solid waste","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Projected increase in global resource demand by 2050","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Exposure to contagious diseases through global interlinkages and interdependencies","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased vulnerability to supply chain disruptions and fragility","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Social inequality and inherent brittleness in the current economic system","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High levels of co2 emissions due to reduced impact of lockdown measures","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"High cost of reducing co2 emissions during the lockdown","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Prediction of climate breakdown as a greater threat than covid-19","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Close contact in built environments can facilitate the spread of contagious diseases.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Globalization of cycles diminishing resilience","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Short-term crisis management exacerbating future shocks","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate focus on resilience and sustainability","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Interconnectedness between environmental, economic, and social sustainability","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of production capabilities in underdeveloped economies","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Difficulty in working from home and lack of access to health facilities in underdeveloped regions","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential spread of contagious diseases through the recovery and redistribution of surplus food","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"High labor-intensive nature of circular economy activities","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Substitution of labor for energy and materials in the circular economy","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Barriers to transitioning to a circular economy","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Challenges in data sharing and supply chain complexity","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Prohibitive start-up investment costs","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Risk of human-to-human transmission of covid-19","category":"","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Decline in low-carbon investments due to economic downturn","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of legal and financial support from authorities","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Innovation across multiple domains required","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of promotion of green logistics and waste management regulations","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Vibrant local manufacturing as an enabler of resilient economy","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Behavioural change in consumers","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Diversification and circularity of supply chains","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"}]}
